endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed performance metrics for the specified telecom network.
Generate a performance visualization for the given network and time range.
Fetch the comprehensive reports on network operations for analysis.
Provide suggested optimizations based on the collected data.
Retrieve information about individual nodes in the telecom infrastructure.
Update configurations for a specific node within the network.
Retrieve a summary of current network alerts and their severities.
Configure settings for receiving specific types of alerts.
Access historical performance data trends for analysis.
Generate predictive trends based on current and historical network data.
